content.text: Pool maintenance has never been easier and more effective, thanks to the dual action of the Duo Z Chlor tablet.
For pools of less than 40,000 L. 1 tablet per week for 20 weeks.
For pools of 40,000 L or more. 2 tablets per week for 20 weeks.
Balance water parameters using a test kit
Add the Duo Z Chlor tablet (place it in the skimmer or in a floating dispenser)
Destroys algae with advanced zinc oxide technology
Decreases the number of shock treatments required per month*
Maintains stable chlorine levels and water parameters
Smile guaranted! The performance of our products is tested in our laboratories for your satisfaction
